description.narrative: Total Disbursement in First Quarter of 2021

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Maintain throughout Project implementation, a Project management unit within MoES (PMU), with composition, staff in numbers andwith qualifications, resources, terms of reference, and functions acceptable to the Bank.
Maintain throughout Project implementation the Working Group, with composition, resources, terms of reference and functionsacceptable to the Bank.

Unless otherwise agreed with the Bank, not later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, establish and maintain throughoutProject implementation the grant approval committee (GAC), with composition, resources, terms of reference and functions acceptableto the Bank.
The Borrower, through MoES, shall make each Grant under a Grant Agreement with the respective Beneficiary on terms and conditionsapproved by the Bank.

title.narrative: Proportion of classrooms with improved learning environment at the primary level resulting from project interventions
Proportion of (implemented) school improvement plans that use performance data and monitoring tools for improving student learning
Proportion of school improvement plans focusing on improving student learning
Share of project supported primary schools that implement the grants in compliance with grant performance indicators
Proportion of school board members satisfied with their engagement during school improvement plan preparations
Proportion of students and parents satisfied with their engagement during school improvement plan preparations
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Number of schools with enhancements to IT equipment for learning purposes as result of the project
Number of primary education schools with upgrades in basic infrastructure as a result of the project
Teachers recruited or trained - Female (RMS requirement)
Number of customized reports from the national assessments produced
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning - Female
NEC staff and associates capacity in test construction, data analysis and reporting improved
Proportion of classrooms with improved quality of teaching practices as measured by in-class teacher observation tool

baseline.value: to be determined by baseline assessment of a representative sample of schools

target.value: 40 % of classrooms improved as measured by the follow up assessment of a representative sample of schools

title.narrative: National Assessment in third grade conducted

baseline.value: National assessment program in 3 grade doesn't exist

actual.value: The preparations for the pre-tested has started. The MOES has advanced this activity with its own resources.

actual.value: TOR for the review of the school network agreed.
